snippet: Hospitals in Dallas have set up Ebola isolation wards and revamped procedures to deal with new patients, as the sprawling Texas city waits to see if the deadly virus spreads following the first case diagnosed on U.S. soil....

headline.print_headline: Dallas Hospitals Set Up Ebola Wards as City Watches for Spread
headline.main: Dallas Hospitals Set Up Ebola Wards as City Watches for Spread

lead_paragraph: Hospitals in Dallas have set up Ebola isolation wards and revamped procedures to deal with new patients, as the sprawling Texas city waits to see if the deadly virus spreads following the first case diagnosed on U.S. soil.
